description: Runs processing tasks on an [EOEPCA](https://eoepca.org/) compliant processing platform, which essentially runs a hosted docker container.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to be passed to the external processing platform.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Absolute URL to a remote EOEPCA service.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Additional data such as configuration options to be passed to the container.

returns.description: The data processed by the external processing platform.
